ReinforcementController - Class in controllers.game
Class ReinforcementController is the controller which is bound to ReinforcementView and instructs the model to perform actions based on user inputs
ReinforcementController(ReinforcementView) - Constructor for class controllers.game.ReinforcementController
Constructor of the class which initialize the view
ReinforcementTests - Class in test.models
This class tests reinforcement functions in Player model class
ReinforcementTests() - Constructor for class test.models.ReinforcementTests
 
ReinforcementView - Class in views.game
Class ReinforcementView is the view for a part of setup phase and the reinforcement phase in this view players place their given armies one by one on their own countries then reinforcement phase begins
ReinforcementView(JPanel) - Constructor for class views.game.ReinforcementView
The constructor of the class which adds the components to the controlPanel and initials the first player for placing his given armies on his countries
removeAdjacentCountryByID(int) - Method in class models.map.Country
Removes the adjacent country by ID.
removeCard(int) - Method in class models.game.Player
This method remove a card from cardList of player.
removeConnection(int, int) - Method in class models.map.Map
Remove a connection between two countries.
removeContinentByID(int) - Method in class models.map.Map
Remove a continent from the map, and also remove all countries belong to this continent.
removeCountryByID(int) - Method in class models.map.Continent
Removes the country by ID.
removeCountryByID(int) - Method in class models.map.Map
Remove a country from the map, and also remove all connection relationships of this country.
